venue.address_2: Exit 5A off Rt 128/93 in strip mall on left across from Comfort Inn
venue.name: Dunkin Donuts Randolph

item.description:
Click here: Honey Pot Hill Orchards, Stow, MA - Apple Picking and Family Fun

UPDATE:  As of Sunday morning ride still on.....but come by bike or car......for those who want to go by car we will carpool from Panera.  If you want to ride....wear your raingear for a possible shower...it will keep you warmer. 

 

Backroads ride to Honey Pot Hill Orchard in Stow MA to pick our own apples.  Don't forget the cider donuts too!

 

Empty your saddlebags   so you can fit all your apples!  (ok...leave your rain gear just in case)

MEETING TIME:  930 am

                        Kickstands up at 10 am 

The weather will only be in the low 60's so dress warm!

group.name: New England Thunder / South Shore, MA

item.name: Haulen Ass for Apples
